            TIMEOUT 120)
    
    add_executable( bslmt_bslmt_writelockguard "bslmt_writelockguard.t.cpp" )
    target_link_libraries( bslmt_bslmt_writelockguard ${MODULE_NAME}  bsl+bslhdrs bsl+stdhdrs bslalg bsldoc bslh bslim bslma bslmf bslmf bslscm bsls bslmt bsls bsls bslscm bslalg bslma bslmf bsltf bslh bsls bslscm bslma bslmf bsls bslscm bslma bslmf bsltf bsls bslscm bslmf bslscm bslstl bsltf bslx)
    target_include_directories( bslmt_bslmt_writelockguard PRIVATE ../../bsl ../../bsl/bsl+bslhdrs ../../bsl/bsl+stdhdrs ../../bsl/bslalg ../../bsl/bsldoc ../../bsl/bslh ../../bsl/bslim ../../bsl/bslma ../../bsl/bslmf ../../bsl/bslmt ../../bsl/bsls ../../bsl/bslscm ../../bsl/bslstl ../../bsl/bsltf ../../bsl/bslx ../bsl+bslhdrs ../bsl+stdhdrs ../bsl+stdhdrs/sys ../bslalg ../bslim ../bslma ../bslmf ../bsls ../bslscm ../bslstl ../bsltf .  )
    add_test( bslmt_bslmt_writelockguard bslmt_bslmt_writelockguard )
    set_tests_properties( bslmt_bslmt_writelockguard 
        PROPERTIES
        PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "Test passed")
    set_tests_properties( bslmt_bslmt_writelockguard 
        PROPERTIES
        FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "(Exception|Test failed)")
        set_tests_properties( bslmt_bslmt_writelockguard 
            PROPERTIES
            TIMEOUT 120)
